headline: Brokers Suggest Investing in Hasbro (HAS): Read This Before Placing a Bet
summary: According to the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), one should invest in Hasbro (HAS). It is debatable whether this highly sought-after metric is effective because Wall Street analysts' recommendations tend to be overly optimistic. Would it be worth investing in the stock?
